references.paper_title: Generalization on the unseen, logic reasoning and degree curriculum
references.reason: This paper introduces a theoretical framework for logical reasoning in deep learning, which is the foundation of the proposed L-Reg method.
This paper introduces the Invariant Risk Minimization (IRM) approach for domain generalization, which is compared against in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Generalizing from several related classification tasks to a new unlabeled sample
references.reason: This paper provides a theoretical analysis of multi-task learning for generalization, which is relevant to the problem of generalized category discovery addressed in the current paper.
This paper introduces an information maximization approach for few-shot learning, which is closely related to the concept of semantic support used in the current work.
This paper introduces the task of generalized category discovery, which is one of the generalization settings considered in the current paper.
